The mother uses a digital assistant to keep her oriented and remind her what’s going on.Something like “It struck me that this is aOne of the things which really disturbs me about the future is the prospect of losing my marbles and becoming a burden to my relatives. But it gives me some reassurance that a digital assistant might be there to help me remember my shopping list, find my way around, stay in touch with my loved ones, and enjoy my life to the full while I still can.By the time I get to needing one, I will hopefully have accumulated several more decades of using digital technology, so it won’t be unfamiliar to me.
